# signedDate

**Instance Property**

The date that the App Store signed the JWS transaction.

## Declaration

```swift
let signedDate: Date
```

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Transaction/signedDate] to verify whether the certificate used to sign the transaction was valid when the App Store signed the transaction.

## Verifying transactions

- **deviceVerification**: The device verification value you use to verify whether the transaction belongs to the device.
- **deviceVerificationNonce**: The UUID for computing the device verification value.
